title: Carrizo Plain National Monument
name: Goodwin Education Center
directions: located one half mile west of the junction of Painted Rock Road and Soda Lake Road
hours: Open seasonally from the beginning of December to the end of May, Th-Su 9AM-4PM
content: Offers the visitor interpretive displays and exhibits explaining the uniqueness of the Carrizo Plain and the adjoining Elkhorn Plain.  A gift shop sells merchandise ranging from stickers and magnets to posters, books and tee shirts.  A ranger is available to answer questions.  Informational maps and brochures are available at the front door when the Center is closed. The Visitor Center driveway may be closed if road conditions are too muddy for vehicles. Visitors are welcome to hike in during these times.  Handicapped accessible restrooms at the Visitor Center remain open 24 hours a day, seven days a week, throughout the year.
